snippet.title: Eqqo Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
A POETIC AND NARRATIVE ADVENTURE AVAILABLE FOR MOBILES PHONES, TABLETS, AND VR

Google Playstore mobile and tablets version:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ParallelStudio.EQQOMOBILE&hl=fr

Oculus GO:
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/go/2461352513879642/?locale=fr_FR

Google Daydream:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ParallelStudio.EQQO

It's the story of a mother and her son. The story of a blind hope on which the world of Men depends.

Inspired by ancient Ethiopian legends and architecture, Eqqo is a poetic narrative puzzle game, an initiatory adventure and a love song to nature, to everything that connects us. It’s the improbable epic of two foreign creatures one to the other... A child who can't see, and an Egg, as fragile as it is vital.

EQQO OST: https://nicolasbredin.bandcamp.com/album/eqqo-ost

*******************************************************

C’est l’histoire d’une mère et de son fils. L’histoire d’un espoir aveugle dont dépend le monde des Hommes.

Un jour, Eqqo sortit du village pour jouer... et sa mère ne le revit jamais. Aveugle de naissance, égaré dans une vallée de légendes, il fut pourtant celui à qui le Dieu Serpent donna la mission de ramener l'Œuf Sacré au cœur du Temple d’Issa…
